name: Hunter Gatherer (itch)
description:
This prehistoric adventure was intended to have multiple levels in which you would gather food for your village while fighting various dinosaurs.

all assets are from the superpowers free asset pack.

This #1gam entry is sadly lacking. unfortunately due to a workplace accident I spent some of this month in hospital undergoing surgery. On the upside I didn't lose my hand, however strong pain medication and the use of only my non-dominant hand severely slowed my progress on this project.
